Located near Victoria, British Columbia on Vancouver Island, Nicholson Manufacturing Ltd. is a global leader in the design, manufacture and service of ring debarking and log handling equipment for the forestry industry. By choosing Nicholson, our customers benefit from both proven design and innovation. Decades of experience in engineering and manufacturing combine with a continuous improvement culture to bring leading-edge technology to Nicholson’s products and services. Purposely designed and built to perform, Nicholson equipment can be found in wood processing facilities around the world. For more information about Nicholson, visit www.debarking.com.Nicholson has an opening for a permanent, full-time Manufacturing Engineering Technologist at our manufacturing plant in Sidney, British Columbia.
